==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|み|そ|yomi=k}}

===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{m|ja|三十|tr=miso||thirty}} and suffix {{m|ja|箇|tr=chi}}. The kanji 路 is [[ateji]].

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|みそち}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|三十}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みそち}}

# [[thirty]]
# thirty years of age

===Etymology 2===
/misodi/ → /misozi/. From earlier {{m|ja|三十|tr=misochi}}. Final -chi voices in compounding. The kanji 路 is [[ateji]].

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|みそじ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|三十}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みそじ|hhira=みそぢ}}

# [[thirty]]
# thirty years of age
